data.name: Land of Nod
data.detailed_description:
Land of Nod is a sci-fi shooting game using a low-poly art style to illustrate a mystery and dangerous adventure in a space colony, Planet Nod.
Gameplay
The game includes various gunplay, atmospheric environment design, fluid high mobility, and map design with light puzzle elements.
Art Style
Land of Nod illustrates a ruin and wild extraterrestrial planet. Enoch will walk surrounded by unique vegetation cover and builds to unravel several mysteries and through countless battles.
Story Background
120 years ago, the spaceship captain Niac landed and established domination on the Planet Nod with his crew. However, the ambition of the Niac family is far beyond this. A conspiracy happened in the dark. To what people do not expect, this conspiracy does not only have a deep connection to the firm rule of the Niac family but also concerns the whole planet and the future of life in the entire universe.

data.short_description: Land of Nod is a low-poly art-style sci-fi shooting game. The player will fight against colonial leaders on a far beyond colony planet: The Planet Nod. And explore the secret hidden in this planet and the entire universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

data.legal_notice:
Some art assets are public copyrighted from the Unity Assets Store.
The game's story, scene design, UI, ICONs, and others are original.
All violations of the law action, such as piracy and copycatting, are forbidden.
--From the development team Nakotus Game
